title: Veggie bean stew
description: A simple stew that tastes delicious. Perfect for rainy days when you don't want to go shopping!
ingredients: 1 small sweet potato, cut into 1cm/½in dice
200ml/7fl oz vegetable stock (made from ½ stock cube or ½ tsp bouillon powder)
handful kale, spinach or other leafy green vegetable
salt and freshly ground black pepper
